verses.text: In the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, in the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \f + \fr 1.1 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*\f + \fr 1.1 \ft governor: or, captain\f*

Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w time|strong="H6256"\w* is not \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* should be \w built|strong="H1129"\w*.
Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\add Is it\add* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* for you, O ye, to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in your \w cieled|strong="H5603"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add lie\add* \w waste|strong="H2720"\w*?

Now therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Consider|strong="H7760"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft Consider…: Heb. Set your heart on your ways\f*

Ye have \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in \w little|strong="H4592"\w*; ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, but ye have not \w enough|strong="H7654"\w*; ye \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, but ye are not filled with \w drink|strong="H7937"\w*; ye \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* you, but there is none \w warm|strong="H2527"\w*; and he that earneth \w wages|strong="H7936"\w* earneth \w wages|strong="H7936"\w* \add to put it\add* into a \w bag|strong="H6872"\w* with \w holes|strong="H5344"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft with holes: Heb. pierced through\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Consider|strong="H7760"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft Consider…: Heb. Set your heart on your ways\f*

Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and I will take \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in it, and I will be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Ye \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* for \w much|strong="H7235"\w*, and, lo, \add it came\add* to \w little|strong="H4592"\w*; and when ye \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, I did \w blow|strong="H5301"\w* upon it. Why? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* of mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that \add is\add* \w waste|strong="H2720"\w*, and ye \w run|strong="H7323"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft blow…: or, blow it away\f*

Therefore the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* over you is \w stayed|strong="H3607"\w* from \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w stayed|strong="H3607"\w* \add from\add* her \w fruit|strong="H2981"\w*.

And I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for a \w drought|strong="H2721"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and upon the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and upon the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and upon the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and upon \add that\add* which the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and upon \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and upon all the \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

¶ Then \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, with all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w message|strong="H4400"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* with you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* stirred \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,

In the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.
